name: Choice of party/Selección de partido político (ES)
label: Enter the full name of the political party you wish to join or leave blank.
error_msg: Choice of party must be filled out.
instructions: Si no desea registrarse para una fiesta, deje este campo en blanco. Todavía puedes puede votar en las elecciones generales y en las elecciones primarias no partidistas (que no son específicas de un partido político). But if your state holds a partisan primary election, you'll need to register with that party to vote in the partisan primary election.

name: Confirm Eligibility* (Spanish)
label: I am a U.S. citizen and meet the eligibility requirements listed above.
error_msg: Confirm eligibility to continue.
instructions: If you do not agree with the above statement, do not continue with your voter registration.

name: Confirm Information (Spanish)
label: La información que proporcioné es verdadera según mis mejores conocimientos, bajo pena de perjurio.
error_msg: Checkbox must be checked to continue.

name: Current Legal Name: First Name (Spanish)
label: Primer nombre
error_msg: First name must be filled out.

name: Current Legal Name: Last Name (Spanish)
label: Apellido
error_msg: Last name must be filled out.

name: Current Legal Name: Middle Name(s) (Spanish)
label: Segundo nombre(s)
help_text: If you do not have a middle name, leave this field blank.

name: Date of birth (Spanish)
label: Fecha de nacimiento
error_msg: Date of birth must follow the format of 01 19 2000.
instructions: ¡Tenga cuidado de no usar la fecha de hoy!

name: Different Mailing Address (Spanish)
label: I get my mail at a different address from the one above.

name: Home Address: City (Spanish)
label: Ciudad
error_msg: City name must be filled out.

name: Home Address: State (Spanish)
label: Estado
error_msg: Previous state selection must be made.

name: Home Address: Street Address (Spanish)
label: Calle dirección
error_msg: Street address must be filled out.

name: Home Address: ZIP (Spanish)
label: Código posta
error_msg: ZIP code must be 5 digits.

name: ID: No valid ID (Spanish)
label: I do not have a valid ID.
instructions: "None" will appear on your completed form.

name: ID: Social Security Number (Full) (Spanish)
label: Número de seguro social completo
help_text: Proporcione los 9 dígitos de su Número de Seguro Social, por ejemplo (123-55-1234)
error_msg: Social security number must be 9 digits.

name: ID: Social Security Number (Spanish)
label: Social security number (last 4 digits)
help_text: Proporcionar los cuatro últimos dígitos de su número de teléfono Seguridad social, for example (xxx-xx-1234)
error_msg: Social security number must be 4 digits.

name: ID: State Driver's License Number (Spanish)
label: State driver's license number
error_msg: ID number must be filled out.

name: ID: State Non-driver ID (Spanish)
label: State non-driver ID
error_msg: ID number must be filled out.

name: Identification Type (Spanish)
label: Choose your identification type
error_msg: Identification selection must be made from the list.

options.value: I do not have a valid ID

name: Legally changed name (Spanish)
label: I have legally changed my name since the last time I registered to vote.

name: Mailing Address: City (Spanish)
label: Ciudad
error_msg: City name must be filled out.

name: Mailing Address: State (Spanish)
label: Estado
error_msg: Mailing state selection must be made.

name: Mailing Address: Street Address (Spanish)
label: Calle dirección
error_msg: Mailing street address must be filled out.

name: Mailing Address: ZIP Code (Spanish)
label: Código postal
error_msg: ZIP code must be 5 digits.

name: Moved (Spanish)
label: I have moved since I last registered in this state.

name: Name Before Legally Changed: First Name (Spanish)
label: Primer nombre
error_msg: First name must be filled out.

name: Name Before Legally Changed: Last Name (Spanish)
label: Apellido
error_msg: Last name must be filled out.

name: Name Before Legally Changed: Middle Name(s) (Spanish)
label: Segundo nombre(s)
help_text: If you do not have a middle name, you may leave this field blank.

name: No Street Address (Spanish)
label: I do not have a street address.

name: Phone Number (Spanish)
label: Número de teléfono (optativo)
error_msg: Phone number must be 10 digits.
instructions: La mayoría de los estados solicitan su número de teléfono por si tienen preguntas sobre su solicitud. Sin embargo, no es necesario que proporcione su número de teléfono.

name: Previous Home Address: Apt or Lot# (Spanish)
label: Nº. de depto. o lote

name: Previous Home Address: City (Spanish)
label: Ciudad
error_msg: City name must be filled out.

name: Previous Home Address: State (Spanish)
label: Estado
error_msg: Previous state selection must be made.

name: Previous Home Address: Street Address (Spanish)
label: Calle dirección
error_msg: Previous street address must be filled out.

name: Previous Home Address: ZIP Code (Spanish)
label: Código postal
error_msg: ZIP code must be 5 digits.

name: Race or Ethnic Group (Spanish)
label: Raza o grupo étnico
error_msg: Race or ethnic group must be filled out.
instructions: En caso afirmativo, seleccione la opción que mejor lo describa de la lista.

options.value: Indígena norteamericano o nativo de Alaska

name: Section: Current Legal Name (Spanish)
label: What is your legal name?
section_description: Using the name on your driver’s license or other non-driver ID is recommended.
section_alert: Enter your full legal name. Be sure to include your first, middle, and last name. No use apodos ni iniciales.

name: Section: Home Address (Spanish)
label: What is your home address?
section_alert: "Enter your home address (su dirección legal). No ponga aquí su dirección postal si no es la misma que su dirección particular. No use una casilla de correo o una ruta rural sin un número de casilla."

name: Section: Mailing Address
label: What is your mailing address?
section_description: Enter the address where you receive mail so voter registration materials can be sent to you. You can use a post office box number.
section_alert: If you live in a rural area but do not have a street address, or if you have no address, you must enter an address where you can be reached by mail. You will have the opportunity to show where you live on a map when you print out your form.

name: Section: Moved and No Street Address (Spanish)
label: Check one or both boxes if they apply to you.

name: Section: Name Before Legally Changed (Spanish)
label: ¿Cómo se llamaba antes de cambiar de nombre?

name: Section: No Street Address (Spanish)
label: Check this box if it applies to you.

name: Section: Previous Home Address (Spanish)
label: ¿Cuál era la dirección con que estaba inscrito antes?
section_description: Si estuvo inscrito antes, pero esta es la primera vez que se está inscribiendo con la dirección, ¿cuál era la dirección con que estaba inscrito antes? Please give us as much of the address as you can remember.

name: State Selection (Spanish)
label: I live in:*
error_msg: State or territory selection must be made.
